text: Sebastián Decoud was the defending champion, but chose to compete in Pereira instead. Filippo Volandri won in the final 6–4, 7–5, against Lamine Ouahab. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== *Qualifying Singles *Main Draw Rai Open - Singles 2010 Singles
title: 2010 Rai Open – Singles
